snippet.title: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden - Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2023
snippet.description:
Pre-order the Collector's Edition of Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden while stocks last here: https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/banishersghostsofneweden?utm_campaign=Banishers_GameplayTrailer&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTubeFocusStore
You will get:
- a separable statuette of Red and Antea
- the game’s official artbook
- a Steelbook®
- two Banishers signet rings
- the game on the platform of your choice
- the Wanderer Set DLC

You can already wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493640/Banishers_Ghosts_of_New_Eden/?utm_campaign=Banishers_GameplayTrailer&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTubeSteam

We're thrilled to share a captivating new trailer for Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden, our poignant action-RPG where you hunt and battle supernatural horrors to alter a tragic fate.

Battle hand-in-hand with your loved one!

Play as Antea Duarte and Red mac Raith, lovers and Banishers—ghost-hunters who vowed to protect the living from the threat of lingering ghosts and specters. After Antea has tragically become one of the spirits she loathes, take on a desperate search for a way to liberate her from her new plight.

In the haunted wilds of North America, enter the lives of New Eden’s communities to unburden a world plagued with supernatural creatures and ancient secrets. Use your wits or combine Antea’s spiritual powers and Red’s powerful arsenal to defeat and banish the souls that torment the living.

Heavy decisions will also lay on your path as you decide the fate of New Eden’s inhabitants, dramatically impacting your story and challenges. How much will you compromise your ghost-hunting vow for the sake of your lover who became one of such spirits?

Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden will be released end of 2023 on Steam and get the Wanderer Set DLC.

To get the latest info and upcoming exclusive offers for Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden, [url=https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/login/#signup]sign up as a Focus member[/url]!

To get the latest info and upcoming exclusive offers for Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden, sign up as a Focus member now: https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/login/#signup

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/Focus_entmt
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FocusEntertainmentOfficial
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/focus_entmt/
- TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@focus_entmt
